channel.title: Python on WM Seismic Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Python on WM Seismic Solutions

item.title: First Release of Python Bindings to OpendTect
item.description: The 6.6.8 release of the wmPlugins includes a Python module, wmodpy, to access OpendTect survey and well information. Unlike OpendTect’s existing odpy module, wmodpy is a direct binding to the OpendTect C++ code.
